title: AttributeError: type object 'torch._C.FloatTensorBase' has no attribute 'numpy'
body_html:
Having followed the installation steps, I encounter this error while running the rl examples:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "actor_critic.py", line 7, in <module>
import torch
  File "/home/m09/.virtualenvs/pytorch/lib/python3.4/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 250, in <module>
    from . import _torch_docs, _tensor_docs
  File "/home/m09/.virtualenvs/pytorch/lib/python3.4/site-packages/torch/_tensor_docs.py", line 1007, in <module>
    add_docstr(torch._C.FloatTensorBase.numpy,
AttributeError: type object 'torch._C.FloatTensorBase' has no attribute 'numpy'

I tested installs both with python 2.7 and python 3.4. Both fail.

body:
Having followed the installation steps, I encounter this error while running the rl examples:

    Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "actor_critic.py", line 7, in <module>
    import torch
      File "/home/m09/.virtualenvs/pytorch/lib/python3.4/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 250, in <module>
        from . import _torch_docs, _tensor_docs
      File "/home/m09/.virtualenvs/pytorch/lib/python3.4/site-packages/torch/_tensor_docs.py", line 1007, in <module>
        add_docstr(torch._C.FloatTensorBase.numpy,
    AttributeError: type object 'torch._C.FloatTensorBase' has no attribute 'numpy'

I tested installs both with python 2.7 and python 3.4. Both fail.
